help.helpLine: The game consists of 10 rounds of questions whose topics will be: (History, Geography, Gastronomy, Sports and Arts).
The 5 topics are always presented in the same order and will be repeated once.
The maximum score for each round is 100 pts. The score will decrease over time depending on how fast the player choose the answer.
In each question, the player will have 30 seconds to answer correctly and earn points. At the end of 10 rounds of play the final game score results will be presented.
The player can use the arrow keys (up and down) and the OK button to confirm.

exit.exitText: If you leave the Game you will loose your current progress.
